name: cackled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
cackle
to make the loud, unpleasant sound of a chicken: The hens cackled in alarm.
disapproving to laugh in a loud, high voice: A group of women were cackling in a corner. a cackling witch
